summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4843 for the improvement of Juneau Street, from Beacon Avenue to a point 250 feet east of 25th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55754, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
